name: Sonic the Hedghog 4: Episode 2 (LEAKED ALPHA VERSION)
name_original: Sonic the Hedghog 4: Episode 2 (LEAKED ALPHA VERSION)
description:
A leaked prototype of the hit game Sonic the Hedgehog 4: Episode II, the second game in Capcom's critically acclaimed Sonic the Hedgehog 4 saga. Leaked in 2011, this game was very different from the final version and was scrubbed from the internet by Konami. Now it's back and ready to be experienced by a new generation of Gamers!

As the game is incomplete, a GameShark had to be installed in order to access all of the zones. Like Sega's other prototypes, you can access debug mode by inputting the Sonic 1 level select code on the title screen.
No seriously, they used to do that. I did the level select code on the title screen of a Shadow the Hedgehog demo at a trade show back in 2005 and it brought up a bugged level select screen.

CONTROLS:

Move: Arrow Keys

Jump: Shift

Homing Attack: Shift (while jumping)
